column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque is decent barbecue. I got the mini pork sandwich
column2: it was flavorful and juicy. The fries were mediocre and the corn bread was moist but not much flavor. The peach cobbler was tasty
column3: good sweetness and crunch. The establishment it self was a bit run down and they make you pick up your own food once your seated. Overall I would say Smoque is just Okay.
